experience.title: Prompt Engineer
experience.description: Leveraged email categorization techniques through prompt engineering in order to establish a fully automated and streamlined sales processâ€¢ Integrated Gmail API in Python, optimizing the email access to primarily classify the emails into Product Order, Inquiry and Irrelevantâ€¢ Further classified the Inquiry emails into query and quotation categories; generated SQL command to extract data for query type mailâ€¢ Utilized GPT-3.5 API, both for the classification of mails as well as for PDF-based information extraction for some of the categoriesâ€¢ Achieved an accuracy of around 95% in the classification (Primary and Secondary) and an accuracy of 88% for the PDF-info retrivel task
experience.description_html: Leveraged email categorization techniques through prompt engineering in order to establish a fully automated and streamlined sales processâ€¢ Integrated Gmail API in Python, optimizing the email access to primarily classify the emails into Product Order, Inquiry and Irrelevantâ€¢ Further classified the Inquiry emails into query and quotation categories; generated SQL command to extract data for query type mailâ€¢ Utilized GPT-3.5 API, both for the classification of mails as well as for PDF-based information extraction for some of the categoriesâ€¢ Achieved an accuracy of around 95% in the classification (Primary and Secondary) and an accuracy of 88% for the PDF-info retrivel task

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Developed a robust text classification model utilizing advanced NLP techniques to categorize articles accurately into violent and non-violentâ€¢ Extracted and labeled 25,000 articles from a pool of 5 million+ articles using the GPT API, ensuring a high-quality dataset for trainingâ€¢ Employed data balancing for uniform class representation and fine-tuned BERT and DistilBERT models on the prepared test datasetâ€¢ Achieved a remarkable 93% accuracy in classification of articles with the DistilBERT approach, signifying its efficacy for the task at hand
experience.description_html: Developed a robust text classification model utilizing advanced NLP techniques to categorize articles accurately into violent and non-violentâ€¢ Extracted and labeled 25,000 articles from a pool of 5 million+ articles using the GPT API, ensuring a high-quality dataset for trainingâ€¢ Employed data balancing for uniform class representation and fine-tuned BERT and DistilBERT models on the prepared test datasetâ€¢ Achieved a remarkable 93% accuracy in classification of articles with the DistilBERT approach, signifying its efficacy for the task at hand

experience.title: Computer Vision Intern
experience.description: Analysed patents comprehensively by employing various techniques to optimize images, assess complexity, quantify structural characteristicsâ€¢ Compressed 2.5 million images using jpeg lossless compression, without compromising the quality of images and calculated size ratiosâ€¢ Deployed keras_ocr to preprocess the images and to find the complexity, calculated the number of edges with the help of hough linesâ€¢ Identified the solid lines with the help of contours and measured the ratio of solid to dotted line to detect the weightage of solid part
